heading: Brokerages
subHeading: Connect to the live markets using any of our supported brokerages
content: Brokerages supply a connection to the exchanges so that you can automate orders using LEAN. You can use multiple data feeds in live trading algorithms.

featureShortDescription.06: Equities, Options, Forex, Futures, & Future Options
featureShortDescription.10: Equities, Forex, CFD, Crypto, Futures, & Future Options
